title: JSON schema for OSTW lobby setting files.

Draw After Match Time Elapsed With No Ti.$ref: #/definitions/Draw After Match Time Elapsed With No Tiebreaker

Enabled Maps.description: An array of enabled maps for the 'Assault' mode.

Disabled Maps.description: An array of disabled maps for the 'Assault' mode.

Disabled Maps.description: An array of disabled maps for the 'Control' mode.

Disabled Maps.description: An array of disabled maps for the 'Escort' mode.

Disabled Maps.description: An array of disabled maps for the 'Hybrid' mode.

Enabled Maps.description: An array of enabled maps for the 'Push' mode.

Disabled Maps.description: An array of disabled maps for the 'Push' mode.

Disabled Maps.description: An array of disabled maps for the 'Capture The Flag' mode.

Disabled Maps.description: An array of disabled maps for the 'Deathmatch' mode.

Bounty Increase Per Kill As Bounty Targe.$ref: #/definitions/Bounty Increase Per Kill As Bounty Target

Enabled Maps.description: An array of enabled maps for the 'Bounty Hunter' mode.

Disabled Maps.description: An array of disabled maps for the 'Bounty Hunter' mode.

General.description: The list of hero settings that affects both teams.

Team 1.description: The list of hero settings that affects team 1.

Team 2.description: The list of hero settings that affects team 2.

Description.description: The description of the custom game.

Mode Name.description: The name of the custom game mode.

Beam Effects.description: The 'Beam Effects' extension costs 2 extension points.

Beam Sounds.description: The 'Beam Sounds' extension costs 1 extension points.

Buff Status Effects.description: The 'Buff Status Effects' extension costs 2 extension points.

Debuff Status Effects.description: The 'Debuff Status Effects' extension costs 2 extension points.

Buff and Debuff Sounds.description: The 'Buff and Debuff Sounds' extension costs 2 extension points.

Energy Explosion Effects.description: The 'Energy Explosion Effects' extension costs 4 extension points.

Kinetic Explosion Effects.description: The 'Kinetic Explosion Effects' extension costs 4 extension points.

Explosion Sounds.description: The 'Explosion Sounds' extension costs 2 extension points.

Play More Effects.description: The 'Play More Effects' extension costs 1 extension points.

Spawn More Dummy Bots.description: The 'Spawn More Dummy Bots' extension costs 2 extension points.
